alert.note: Alert for Barry; Eaton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 12:09AM EDT until June 14 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Barry County in southwestern Michigan... Eaton County in south central Michigan... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1208 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Lake Odessa, or 11 miles east of Hastings, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Lansing... Charlotte... Eaton Rapids... Potterville... Nashville... Kalamo... Olivet... Brookfield... Dimondale... Vermontville... Sunfield... Mulliken... Woodland... Gresham... Woodbury... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
